channel.title: Raycast/LineCast unity
channel.description: So I've been messing with unity and I am wondering if anyone knows how when using raycast or linecast how can I detect where the line hits another object like that exact position where it hits and return that as a vector3 the reason I need to use is because I'm trying to make my own pathfinding script

item.title: Raycast/LineCast unity
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Your out variable of type RaycastHit will contain Vector3 point

http://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/RaycastHit.html

So just do RaycastHit.point

Read full topic
